Blog.post: today din go to skool.... cos i received msg from mj n vs saying they all not going.. so i tot they all keng dim d.. so i ma decide not to go la.. mana tau..she went wo.. then we scared she angry la.. go alone.. dunno how d leh.. wanted to call but come back too late d.. so din call lo... srry lo cm... then went pol lo... got exam.. did half way.. essay.. no mood to write then just hand in the uncompleted work lo.. then just play with teacher, mj n vs....with my cutie handphone.. take photo la.. hehe... very nice..raining... they went to my house.. mj say wan on9..cos mum ban her d... haha..kesian... we then go eat lo... very nice.. actually wan go c wilson wan.. but wan bring them home.. din gt to c him lo.. sis say next time lo... anson on... chatted with her.. she say things tht i felt geli.. i hate her saying tht... she like wanna an shi me.. but i feel annoyed whn she did tht.... i dowan to pi kai her but i cant stand.. i donlike the situation now.. how much i wish we nvr met.. then nth will happen... nobody will suffer.. she suddenly talked bout my ex.. then i ma say em se dak nick go s'pore lo... i really mean it wan le.. but i purposely say more things bout nick la.. like our memories n stuff like tat la.. which i seldom talk bout.. cos the memory is ours... there's nonit to tell anybody.. especially the unknowns.... but too bad i got to do tat to make her die heart.. then she like not happy lo.. calling me go with her la.. haiya..anything she wan to say la.. who cares.... but nick really wan go d wo.. want to hv farewell for her... but she say dowan... tonite she din online... erm... mj say buy her a pink color t shirt.. say wanna play her out ... haha.... dunno wat's her reaction leh.. when get the pink t shirt.. haha.. a bit em se dak le... y so wanna go there leh.. here oso can play ma.. here oso got work ma.. dunno leh.. her parents kua.. os maybe herself la... dunno....

yest anson was sad.. n so do i .. i really dont mean to hurt.. sorry... frens say i am yi mao qu ren... got meh.. maybe lo..too bad lo.. i scared to hurt ppl le.. gals r weak.. it's true..... especially gals like her.. st said wan.. haiyo.. y copy her words leh..hahha....so i think the best way.. actually i oso dunno wat to do le.. but maybe she would forget in few days time le.. don thnk urself being so important ok?? okok.. anything.. today at skool talked alot... laughed alot.. enjoyed alot playing with frens... love ya all... hehe.. geli~~~ going tuition....haih.. i hate tuition..

i know wat she is thinking.. i die d la.. i shoulnt have so this stupid thing.. i shouldnt simply meet ppl.. i don mean to hurt..really.... cos i blive if one has hury other..he or she will has the same consequence tht the ppl being hurt is facing.. i really afraid of bao ying... i really don mean tohurt.... trust me... anyone.. pls.. help me... she is just so weak.. she ask me whther i am pure les... i said not really... i said my ex was a butch.. she asked whther i like only butch... i say dunno.. she call me to try n c la.. whether which type i like.. then i say i already promise my ex.. i said i would only start a new relationship if my ex has found a new wan.. she is like..huh??? y promise this??? then i say nvm la...she say i stupid.. i say it's ok for me.. she say then if got other gal like u ma very kesian lo.. i say nvm lo..wat to do...she ask if someone likes me.. then wat would i do... make her wait?? i say i din think of it yet.. i sayc how la.. i oso dunno.. then she like very sad n say she wanna change topic.. she say i cant give her the answer... then she say she sick... i asked y not c doc... she then say nonit la.. nobody cares for her... i ask her y say so.. she say she cant be with the ppl she love.. my god.... wat am i to say??? i just pretend like nth happen lo.. act like iam innnocent... act like iam stupid... wat can i do...???? i very scared le.. i don mean to hurt... i really don mean to hurt...

today skool canteen day.. sis drive us there... help at our stall in the morning... went 5A's rumah sesat.. hold vs's hand until red red.. i knocked my head too.... quite pain.. saw vs's ferns.. ktw they all.. be4 this i tot he was my ex tuition fren.. but seems like he's not.. his face very pretty.. red red wan... we went to our stall to help.. at first we r halauing flies... later more n more ppl started to come buy ice cream n drinks..busy but fun.. enjoyed selling n helping.. nick came with st n crystal n frens.. i saw nick.. she changed alot.. thinner.. more yeng n of cos cuter.. i tried very hard to act like normal.. but i feel like she's ignoring me.. so i'm like.. anything la.. don care..then go c crystal with mj.. she is short.. but cute.. golden colored hair.. they r sweet.. imean st n her la.. so close.. then they intro lo.. mj quite xia sui in front of crystal.. i know she very gan cheong wan .. somore nick was playing her.. so she lidat lo..dunno how to say.. then i saw bernard lo.. he n his frens la.. i saw lawrence too.. very tall wan.. n big sized.. then they come pong chan our stall.. bernard very shy.. make me like dunno wat to say oso.. then anson n lu came.. me n mj go find them... lu vry yeng.. very pretty as well... but too bad lo.. got gf d.. then we go eat lo... walk here walk there only lo.. until leg oso pain.. then saw nick they all... n we took photo.. mj take with crystal.. then done.. nick said she wan go s'pore d.. for 3 months.. dunno play or work la... everytime ask her sth oso duwan answer seriously wan.. haih.. then they went back lo... ya.. i saw hasrin too.. she very cute d.. hair not tht short d.. i ask her when wanna become gal back.. she say dowan la.. n jokingly ask me wanna be in her gf's list anot.. haha.. she is just the past hasrin.. even cuter.. then anson, lu, mj, vs, cm, xy, cx, wl n me went 4e's ghost hse.. lu the first wan.. she quite afraid.. when we r inside..i tried very hard to see wat's happening aroud.. but i just couldnt after seeing a ghost.. no.. it's a human with a very scary mask.. just standing beside me leh.. so i just close my eyes lo.. very xia sui leh.. come out evryone said not scary wan.. i am the only who say it is.... haih.. y i so pengecut wan.. then we go eat lo.. vs n cm like don like anson n lu.. they just ignore them..maybe they really pei si lesbian wan lo.. too bad.. then we go walk around lo... saw hsiaofen... she very yeng.. hair very yeah.. she now study at kl d lo.. in tarc...marketing wo.. beh pai ha.. then lu wan buy small small thing give her gf.. so brought them to 4L lo.. buy test tube.. she bought 1 n anson bought 1... anson bought 1 for me... before she go she gave me.. inside testtube wrttng " sweet memory".. then we go pwtc sit n keng kai... anson is good at interacting.. she got alot to talk bout.. lu is very cool.. vry quiet... then she say got technical prob wan go buy somore.. then she go buy couppon then go buy the est tube again... they bought bout 4 or 5.. i think she loves her gal very much lo..so sweet.. then they went back.. me n sis went back at 2 sth.. at home.. we chat bout canteen day while eating.. hui said very sat mong cos din c wilson.. she saw chu.. then called him n ask whr is wilson.. but just coulndnt find him..too bad.. sis at the song dedication reception saw chu with a white-shirt guy... tot he was wison but he is not.. he is frm staj.. hui very very sat mong le.. i thknk she in luv with wilson d la.. haih.. wanted so much to tell her stop thinking of him.. becos.. love is bu jian dan.. haih....

it's our skool canteen day tomorrow.. but it's like.. no feeling.. vs cut her hair.. at dunno where la.. she said very yeah wo.. dunno leh.. tomorrow only give comment la.. but since cm oso said quite ok then it's nice liao lo.. maklumlah.. she seldom praise.. hehe... sorry ha cm... just now vns cried again.. i think the really break d la.. he no mood to work.. he was down n it affected his work.. mummy was angry with him.. then he asked me to say sorry to mummy.. i did.. n i m sure mummy will forgive him.. he now talking on phone somore.. dunno still crying anot.. haih... just now dad called.. asked if i wanna change phone... cos since i just started using the new wan.. the uncle says can change with the new 7610i... thou i know it's new phone but i really really like this phone le.. 6230.. nice name.. nice phone.. so i said no thx.. then dad said.. y not? now in m'sia havent out le.. only in s'pore.. if u dowan i gonna buy 4 myself.. haih.. buy phone somore wannna fight again meh.. dowan la..... just now anson said tat she is coming.. confirm d... her fren drive her to our skool.. yeah.. mj sure very happy wan.. she wanted so much to know her.. haha.... dunno how she looks like leh?? c la tomorrow.... tomorrow gonna c nick at canteen day.. long time din c d.. since break i think.. dunno wat will happen... sure very embarrassing wan.. haih... very scared to c her le.. dunno wat to say.. dunno how shld i act like.. as if nth happened?? or just act like the past?? dunno leh... yahor.. her ex oso coming.. dunno how she looks like leh?? longing to c her.. not to compare la of cos.. who am i to compare with her wo.. just feel curious lo.... just now mummy said she very stressed.. she feel like not working anymore.. i feel sad when i heard this but act like nth.. i know she is tired.. i know i know... but.. wat can i do.. maybe have to help her more .. obey her words.. n... love her.. i love u, mummy... just as u love us.... mummy.. i love u!!!

just know hui said vns crying... i was shocked.. cry again?? they break?? again?? haih.. love is a troublesome thingy... it brings joys but oso heartbreaks... better not involve in this thing anymore.. heartbreak may kill.. becos it hurts.. haih... better stay awy frm it.. the farther the better... love can kill...

just now dad pretend to talk bout the phone in front of mummy.. iknow he is helping me.. thx daddy... but i know mummy is not happy.. or rather say tht she is angry.. i knw cos i can see frm her face ma.. i using the phone d.. phone very nice.. color n function oso perfect... i like it so much.. but if the phone will cause any arguement, i rather not using it.. i really really mean it..

nick says she quit skool d.. cant blive it's true..why did she quit skool?? very geram when i heard tht....i wanted so much to call her back to skool.. but i cant do anything... n no sen fen as well... i am just a nobody... i cant be like the past... cant be like her mom.. cant be like anyone... becos i'm just a nobody...not more than a nobody.. she seems like dowan to tell me anything.. i dunno wat's going wrong with her.. i asked her.. she say no.. no prob.. nth.. that's all she say... nthmore..since she refused to tell then that's it la.. wat can i do more than just asking.. i wondering.. i really dunno.. don care la.. really don care d... since she don care.... i cant do anything...

on9.. saw vs.. n after a while she on.. she started with.. so action la now.. i oso feel lazy to argue back d la.. yest like tat talk to me.. i admit la i am small gas.. so how.. u said it's the gals' rights to be small gas ma... so i feel tht it's no wrong lo.. invited vs to our chat room... let them talk.. then they sudenly quiet.. i oso feel like not joinging the talk.. then ma keep quiet lo.. then vs asked to just simply talk sth with her.. ok lo.. i ma simply talk sth la.. i insulted her.. er.. n booomed lo.. then she bo song.. left chat room.. then invite again.. talk for a while me n vs purposely play her out.. she went out again.. then in n out for quite some times.. then the last time invite she set offline mode.. ok lo then.. actually i know she is still on wan la.. dowan to chat with me ma.. nvm .. fine.. i oso dowan to commit anything d la.. after i off.. vs said she on again. then they continue chatting lo... she said bought yu heng's cd.. she told vs tht she wanna giv me,.. feel like.. wah.. really ah.... very song ler.. budden leh.. i woulnt not accept wan la.. i cant give her hope anymore.. i think it's time to let go all the silly past things.. tht was wat i promised sis last week... i always break ownself's promise.. so i am thinking of.. just let the promise be the promise this time.. i promised sis wanna be guai guai.. just like the past.. i know sistas have got lota comment bout me recently.. esp when i was being with her.. i know.. i know... i know i am bad.. sorry for letting u all sat mong....really really sorry.. i promise not to commit in this strange relationship anymore.. i promise.. so just treat her cold.. maybe.. maybe just let time decide evrything.. i bliff tht as time goes by.. evrything would change.. evryone would change.. n things would become easier to handle.. just have faith in myself.. n sorry nick.. for wat i have been done.. sorry... just as vs said.. let the bygone be the bygone.... ahaks.... tht's right... jia you jia you...

today mj din go skool... n i discovered one big thing... know wat.. vs looks abit.. no.. i mean alot.. like kk ler.. that's a shocking discorvery.. y now only i c this har?? look exactly leh..haha... don angry la... i am juz telling the truth... today was great in skool... lots of laughing.. hahah.. then at home.. happy to c mummy n daddy clean hse together... haha... mummy fierce fierce call papa clean his table.. papa like an innocent child.. saying yes la yes la... hahah.. he is cute.. n finally.. congrats.. he's done....hhaha.... then i on9 lo.. cos yest jy say wanna tell bout tht thing ma.. but dunno wat thing goes wrong.. st din on.... n then she say mj on just now.. mj asking her bout tht thing... she ask me y tell mj.. hey..pls la.. u can do it y cannot admit.. no i mean.. u can tell me.. sure it;s something tht can be told la.. u din call me to keep this as secret oso..somore i m not telling all the jia yi bing ding.. i am telling my best frenz ler... wat to do with u????? now wanna show face to me.. pls la.. bcos of her wan show face to me.. wat la u.. somore wan say she xia sui nvm.. but she dowan mc xiasui.. ok la.. anything u say la.. anyhtng u wish la.. ok la.. it's my fault la.. it's all my fault la.. for being so tht bitchy.. so tht big mouth.. n not being considerate to mc la.. sorry la.... ok ah.. happy anot.. kam luan anot.. u win la.. all u say la.. all as u wish la.. wat the fuck??? my fault???? puikz!!!

tht day she called.. i think i said a really hurting word.. tht is..." u say hundred n thousand times oso i wont bliff u anymore" i think so like tht la.. then b4 tht we talked quite a lot la..ok la.. nvm la.. anything.. the folowing day went ttwangsa thr,... got xiao zhuang yuen thing.. the kids all very cute.. calling me lao shi lao shi..haha.. so cute.. n 1 even tell me" lao shi, y u so cute wan?" haha.. am song.. kinda fun actually... ya.. saw kk oso... just mj say kk not gd wan wo.. sayng him help calvin wan .. o.. sure st told her alot.. she told me not to bliff in st jy n calvin's words.. now leh..maybe she change her mind d lo..hha.. maybe she would say.. son bliff others.. just st's .. hahha... nola..jk.. hehe.. now chatting with jy.. she ah.. duno y sound so diff.. but i prefer this.. can boom each other.. no pantang.. hahha.. even she say all the miss miss love love thingy.. i would boom back..haha... tats wat i am longing for.. be a fren of hers.. if not the best.. gd oso can liao.. satisfied...ok..then she say she did tht thing b4 with mc.. wondering how leh.. hahha.. k le.. wanna go bath liao.. vs say wan on din on oso... wat la.. hhehe...purposely wan

erm... 1st time i online but forgot to post diary.. amazing ler... haha..cos busying with the frenster thing... i created 1.. list nobody wan.. erm.. saw mc's photo.. damn cun.. the comparison is thr.. wah.. i feel so small ler.. haha... nvm la.. she is cun.. really... nick's gan kong very gd.. haiyo.. prasing owndelf scr tdk langsung... ahaha.. anyhtnig... erm.. well... tat nite i called st but she din ans... folowing day she called.. i ask her bout mc n jy n kurt thng la... she say mc n jy broke on ur sports day.. they faught.. then break d... she call me not to trust calvin.. i become like... full of confussion... dunno which side to bliff in.. i recalled back.. those memories were still fresh... ya... on sports day.. we fight too... bout rosha thng... she said my gesture hurts her... i called her.. i cried.. i say very xin ku being with her.. she said the word i would nvr forget' then u say break la' she said.. of cos i din... i was shocked when i hear this.. she wan me to say break.. instead of break, i said.. i love u.. then ok d.. now look back.. yaho.. no wonder she like weird weird wan la... erm.. dunno.. i cant bliff the fact tht she fool me.. she shldnt have ask me if she has got mc.. tht's unfair for both of us.. st gave a lame excuse for this.. she say jy dunno which wan to choose.. she scared she regret... how smart of her.. 2 2 oso wan then wont regret la... ahha...gao.. then the whole day for me was like.. sux man.. i din go gerald.. sis angry... i sms her.. telling my feelings.. i dunno... no one would understand me.. no one knows how i am feeling... only mj.. maybe she knows... maybe nop... dunno la... today kinda down.... of this.. then later got back papers... wah.... lg teruk.. so like tht la .. come home.. sleep.. then went tuition.. saw jasmine thr.. mj die d la.. nobody pei her.. haha.. see la.. tell u d ma..heed ppl's advice la.. esp mine la... haha.... just now busy with fridae thing.. 1 week din on d i guess.. replying thier mail.. the mouse damn cute.. haha.. the way she talk la.. funny.. then go frenster.. look at ppl's testi lo.. hahah..kp.. then calvin say i bring 1 tom go tuition.. wah.. he ask whether it's st.. pls la.. use brain la.. art n sci.. know how to differentiate anot.. know who's he saying.. vs la.. haha.. i know who tell wan la... sure tht idiot.. so kpc.. ppl's thing oso wanna pat.. haih... guy but so pat po.. kolian...go become gal la... hor.. vs... how dare he say u tom.. fuck him la.. haha... wan ah. dowan la hor.. rugi onli.. hehe... now 2 am d lo.. feel like sleeping =.. but love my pc so much.. em sei dak off le... k la.. wan sleep d..

finally i finished my test... i tried my hard for all the sub but not physics.. my physics sure die d... fear of getting beck the result.. but nvm la.... scared oso no use liao la... rite?/ cant change anything.. yea lo... wat is happened, it's happened... no point looking back.. thinking over n over again... just now i heard sth again....tht's too bad.. everytime i nearly ok d.. sth will just happen.. so sudden..so unexpectedly... ok well.. tht day jinyin called.. she started with these words.." u go out with calvin on friday?".. i was shocked it is her.. i said no.. then she said she know calvin n i talked alot... she say she don care.. she call me to take care of myself.. i was like... i really dunno how to face her after i have heard somany things bout her.. even on phone oso i feel like... dunno wat to talk to her.. then i said" same to u".. phone ended... then i started to recall.. flash back all the memories... thou i tried hard to stop myself frm tht stupid action.. i just cant.. ok fine.. i told myself.. just let it be... things will change after few days.. so i am just like.. erm.. pretending as if nth happened.. but too bad lo.. maybe acting skill damn gao lausy.. mj called at nite.. asking wat happened tome.. i said nth.. but i told her tht nick called la.. then she say anson called her.. anson said me n nick still got thing wan.. ok la.. anything la.. then mj said she called st lo.. need her comfort or advice or anything la.. ya.. mj taking piano test tomorrow.. wish her luck... like tht lo.. then just now chat with calvin.. he said mc n nick last week only break.. so i am like.. huh? i feel myself so stupid... being fooled oso so late only know.. tje world is really small... n many things can happen so coincidently... evrything started with mc's pic.. yea... thou i always say i prefer not to know all these... but in fact.. i think i really wanna know.. at least don sound so stupid.. pity on myself.. haih.. then calvin said tht mc oso dunno la.. but nick mentioned bout me.. saying i am her ex.. ok fine.. cos it's after we break she say this.. yealo ho.. i should have know.. cos she was like.. ermm.... how to say leh.. when i talk bout her ex.. she like dowan to tell... n her words are just diff frm time to time.. how innocent i was... i tot tht she has been hurt n not wanting to recall back anymore... she can couple with 2 person at a time... pui fok lo.. but it is really a flop i would say... u know... the paper n fire story.. things are always like tht.... imposible for u to hide one thing.... not impossible la.. actually it's depend on.. dunno... skill kua... i am glad tht i know all these now.. acutally i duno calvin can be trusted anot.. i really dunno.. but nick n calvin are just the same.... who should i blive in?? i oso dunno how to value d.. i really hope to know the truth lo.. being fooled is not a gd thing...n i hate tht feeling... it;'s just inside me... as if laughing n pranking on me... i hate tht!! knowing the truth i really really need to... i cant stand.. i don like the feeling.. i am dying to know the truth... it may be hurt.. but i rather know the truth than pretend like a fool... knowing half half really drives me crazy... it's already 1.15 am ... i not sleepy.. i cant sleep.. thinking n thinking n thinking... calvin is a gd chatter.... since when we become so fren wan...wondering... chatting with him makes me know alot...now 2 am.. calvin told tht clarence saying me sux.... y leh?? dunno... pls la... i dun even know him.. want say me sux.. wat kind of ppl la.. stupid.. i so innocent... 2.15am now.. papa havent back.. cant sleep... asking calvin how to set cookies.. in fact b4 this.. wq promised to go ask his fren.. ahha.... sorry...2.35 am .. papa's back..called me go sleep.. then he go out again.. k le .. 2.53am.. we talked bout mc.. his love for mc makes me really really touch... if wat he say it;s true then he is a gd guy lo.... i easily bliff wat ppl say... but

today at skool very happy.. whole day talking playing n laghing... the photo is out... so we busy looking for ownself's nice nice look... haha... at layen's hse wan oso out d.. but not so clear;... in fact it's not clear... not very nice la... maybe i a bit paise wanna take there lo.. being with own gang more natural... n of cos more song... so nicer lo.. haha.. they will say me zi lian wan la.. anything.. but too bad.. i owed alot money!! to boonsiew 11++ .... cm 10++.. mj 25++.. haih.. for the first time i owe ppl so much... haih... but will try to return it as fast as possible... then after skool.. took pol test.. vs finished it so fast tht i started to fear tht why am i so lausy... is the paper really tht kacang??? i found lot quest very hard in fact.. then we did group study.. with mj vs n cm... cm is like... sap sap water la.. when she look at the quest... she could solve it just like tht... i really admire her le.. for her inteligence.. hehe.. be my sifu la cm.... ok?? u don speak i assume u agree d ah... ok .. settled...haha.... gain quite a lot actually... physics is kinda hard.. but jusst as vs said.. like it... n find it easy.... okok.. will try... then called daddy to come fetch... reach home... took bath.. n on9.. haih... i really crazy d la.. then met calvin n chatted... he told me tht.. em.. jinyin n meichen have break... i am shocked... he seemed..em... i mean sounded as if ... "yeah!!!! i got chance..." but for me it's just like... shit!!! y talk bout this again?? i am desperately needing to get away frm this bloody matter.... i think it;s time to end all this... n in fact it is end...n i wish i could just get away frm rumours or wateva it is... i am tired.. n i don wanna continue anymore... i am a really simple person that is longing for a simple life... they r just too complicated... which will mess my life... i hope to be fren with jy... but vs said we nvr will n shoulnt as well... i am like.. why??? i think it's possible lo.... just simple n normal fren would be more than enuff...really...actually i wish i dunno anything... i mean.. the relationship between she n mei chen.. knowing too much can really drive a person crazy.... i am the person la.. i know thou pretending like nth.. i know... i know... it;s always sth.... calvin say he got chance... but meichen wants her to take out all his piercing... n change image...wah.. meichen so serious wan meh... cannot wear piercing somore ah... but calvin sau lo.. wat to do.. haha... leng lui guo ran can control guys... haha.... then off lo... went to hui's tuition n c wilson... waited him for so long... met acx n mayjinn thr oso.. but din c him oso.... finally he came.. but me n sis were like... huh?? ok.. well... not bad..kua... hehe... dunno la... as long as he treat hui gd can liao la....rite??? then heard yeayon dad in hospital.... so sad... got exam somore... she sure no mood study wan.. too bad... then sis n me went fo tang... new fo tang at andalas... very big... n nice... zhaixing went oso... he so cute... then we did some advertisement activity... then went back n started online... actuallly today online no fun wan.... just chatting with few ppl n go fridae....then reply mail thr...like this onli lo... but first time see vs on till so late .. ya... just now qing called.... asking wat shirt i wore on tues... he saw me?? then he said he fail the drving test..haih... sis told him to giv rasuah d rite... don heed old ppl's advice la.. c... haih.. hehe... sorry ha sis... =P.. k la... wan go d la.... sleep early...tomorow must study liao... promise myself....hehe///

but failed... yea.. i din study for the whole day.. maybe a bit of yesterday's.. 1 bab of sejarah.. haha.... i am lazy.. n just don feel like studying.. even thou exam is just around the corner... i even can online.. n now is the 3rd time i online today.. haha.. wat la me.. just now chat with calvin.. he said he is gd in hacking ppl's pc.. i believe.. i really believe.. he asked if i wanna try.. i said no.. scared le.. he even mentioned bout clarence they all.. telling bout the bad la of cos.. haih.. this kind of ppl.... he oso keep pranking me on jinyin's stuff.. of cos i oso tease her bout meichen la.. but he seems to love meichen so much.. he wanted me to kill jinyin.. i said i not dare.. i said wanna intro a top killer to him... he said dowan.. he said he wan jinyin's ex to kill her.. haih.. dunno they all la... then threaten to hack my pc lo.. i scared la of cos.. n i betrayed lawrence ler.. sorry la lawrence.. my pc just back frm repair le.. i have addicted to surfing d.. i dowan to lose my comp le... hehhe.... sorry ha... then i went tuition.. cant concentrate.. trying hard but no use.. i know sunita sure very angry of me wan.. haih.. physics really drives me crazy le.. when i walked to panmour to wait for sis.. i saw bernard.. then say hie n bye lo.. mana tau.. behind got ppl shouting: burger, burger.. miss, do u wan any? i felt /// n said no of cos.. then at panmour he came n borrowed phone frm me.. saying his hp no battery.. i said my phone out of creadit... he said wanna miss call only.. then i dialed for him lo.. when i reach home only bernard called.. asking me whether i have reach home.. i say yes.. he said he saw a guy disturbing me.. in my heart saying.. pegecut la u... reach home d only call.. nonit to call la u.. but neway.. thx for caring, bernard.. then at home vs said wanna do group study.. our sifu.. haha.. cm la of cos.. staying back to teach us.. wan la of cos.. i wan jia you liao la.. they all so beria ia.. i oso must study hard.. mummy oso call me to study hard... say don get bad result d ha.. okok.. c la.. i cant promise anything le.. then ma go study sej lo.. but cannot masuk brain oso.. n the guy called.. asking my name.. i said i not free la.. talk for a while.. he oso fed up d la.. call me to go sleep.... haha... k lo.. i go sleep la.. haha.. yea.. today mj went acs.. for the japanese student exchange thingy.. she got to c a lot of japanese.. they sure very cute wan.. haha.... nvm.. mj took photo with them.. can c lo.. haha.. k le.. wan go sleep d.. cannot chat la.. wan to be guai guai d.. study study study... vs n cm say i like to think.. hm... must work harder.. so tht they will know i really can do wan.... if i got mood la.. hehe....

eversince i have known them.. many had changed in my life.. tat i felt surprise tht i am becoming much much more stronger in handling some prob.. i thank them.. for wat they had led me to... they had made me becoming more mature n realising tat there is always tragedies happening.. all around us.. there r lots n lots of ppl tht we din know of before this.. n now we realised tht life is never easy.. the world is so small.. u can hear alot tht u donot want to.. n u have no choice.. but to just sit n listen to wat they are saying.. until u break down.. n surrender... tht's when ppl would laugh at u.. tease u.. hint u.. insult... n watever u name it!! i just keep on thinking bout the thing tht was happened yesterday.. i reacalled wat they had say.. wat they had told me.. n wat i had been thinking.. n i realised tht i cant afford to know or have any realationship with these ppl... they are not just as simple as we think.. more complicated tht we know... she said she is waiiting for me.. sweet words to hear.. n gals like me alwaiz like hearing this.. but fuck u...wat the hack u r saying??? waiting for me??? hahah.. it's funny.. how many times in a day u have to repeat this to different ppl... wat the fuck... damn u!!! only idiot like me will believe in everything tat u have said.. evrything tht u promised... n evry single fucking word u frm ur fucking mouth... how stupid of me!!! u have ruined my life... exam is coming.. n i knoe iam gonna don bad in it.. i wont blame .. maybe this is wat i deserved... facing the fucking consequece tht me myself had brought to...

i think i am happy in the beginning of the day.. evrything goes so cun.. though i din get to complete my work.. or concentrating while teacher is teaching.. i still enjoyed talking with frens.. i have discovered tht.. 1 thing. really really important thing... our frenship is improving.. frm days to days... i really appreciate n love my frens... then after skoool.. we stayed to complete the kerja amal thing.. we took pictures.. kinda funny.. cos we pretending to do sth very very funny... too bad.. mj got things to do.. so she din join us.. then cm went tuitioon.. me n vs talking in skol.. then we went kp.. cos mummy was there.. we went for bowling... at first we wanted to play pool..but too bad.. skool uniform is not allowed.. so we took the second choice.. i win.. haha.. can win vs..haha.. really proud ler... then we went da kei.. it was tiring but was rather fun.. then went back home n bath n went tuition.. at tuition.. jl told me tat the photo has got some prob.. so it cant be washed out.. so sad.. after tuition.. my slipper was missing.. it really fucks.. but mj is gd..of cos la.. my ho ji mui wo.. she lent 1 side to me.. i mean the shoe la.. she wore 1.. i wore 1.... thx mj... muakzz... love u.. then at home.. i online.... i shouldnt have on.. if i don on.. maybe my mood would not be as suck... i heard calvin saying sth bout jinyin... so sudden... n no one knows wat is happenig! he started to say hi.. then evrything is normal... he then tease me sth bout bernard.. evrything was alright until she put a gal's pic on his pic column.. the gal is cun.. cute n pretty.. innocent looking.. realy really cun... he told me tht she was her gf.. he said it is her birthday tomorrow.. of cos.. now i shld say today.. then i asked him wat is her name.. he said mei chen.. i was shocked... mei chen!! ok then.. fine.. it has got nth to do with me.. so i just act normal.. then he suddenly tell me tat she is not his.... saying tht she has a "bf" now.. i am like... ok then? so wat? then he kept on telling mei chen's thing.. until he asked... did u know her bf? i said yes.. then he started to shit evry thing out.. he told me tat they already been together for 1 year +.. i was shocked.. ok fine.. i told myself.. then he continued.. jinyin wanted to do sth to her.. when i asked wat was it.. he said he just couldnt tel..he said he wanted to whacked jinyin for this... but kk stopped him.. meichen cried n begged him... so i was thinking.. fine.. it has got nth to do with me now rite.. but in my heart was that feeling.. feeling of being fooled.. feeling of being played out.. feeling myself exactly like an idiot... being played on.. being watched on.. being laughed on.. n watever... it's hurt... it can be really hurt when u discover the truth.. the pain is just here.. just cant stop feeling the pain until now.. then he wanted my hp num.. i said no.. he asked y... because jinyin i said... he was thinking tat i m teasing him... i said i am not.. but i did not tell the reason.. after he had asked so many times.. i told him tht... i am her ex.. i said.. he said some fucking words... he apologized later... he then sms-ed jinyin to ask... jinyin called... she told me tht he asked.. i said ok.. i told him.. then she asked wat happened.. well, i told her since she wanted so much to know.... then i helped her to ask for his num.. got it..n she sms-ed him.. yea.. she is my ex.. why.. was the word she was saying... of cos.. calvin told me this.. fine.. i really dunno d la.. then vs msg me.. sayng bout tomorrow's group study... how much i wanted to hug her n tell out evrything inside me.. i am tired of all these stupid things... i would go crazy of all these... then st suddenly called... i tot jinyin called her to call.. but she said not.. she said she just wanna chat... so i gave her jinyin's num.... now tht calvin told me it was done... so.... i think he is oso the shou hai zhe... but.. dunno la.. they r just too hard to understand...n i refused to get stuck in it once more... i know she is now with meichen.. so wat??? it's none of my business... really.. i knoe things will just be going on n on.. none stop.. but why not give me a place to breathe now.. i am feeling really tired... my head's twirling circle jerking.. let me go... pls.. pls.. pls.... ** btw thx lawrence for telling me the cold jokes.. though it's not funny at all..tq lawrence... n sorry tht's just sth tht i coulndnt tell..
